title: Cavendish is Gone, British Cycling is Fading: Is This the End of the UK’s Golden Era?
content:
Tour de Hoody: Today's generation has big ask to revive British cycling's dominance as Cavendish's retirement marks end of an era.

Read the full article at Cavendish is Gone, British Cycling is Fading: Is This the End of the UK’s Golden Era? on Velo.
author: ahood
